item.title: Interop 2026: Continuing to improve the web for developers
item.content:encoded: Learn about the features included in Interop 2026.

item.title: Start our latest course, Learn AI!
item.content:encoded: Learn how to build a responsible AI system for your website or web application.

item.title: New to the web platform in January
item.content:encoded: Discover some of the interesting features that have landed in stable and beta web browsers during January 2026.

item.title: December 2025 Baseline monthly digest
item.content:encoded: Read about various happenings with Baseline during December 2025.

item.title: LCP and INP are now Baseline Newly available
item.content:encoded: LCP and INP are now Baseline Newly available as of December 12, 2025.

item.title: New to the web platform in December
item.content:encoded: Discover some of the interesting features that have landed in stable and beta web browsers during December 2025.

item.title: Vote for the web features you want to see
item.content:encoded: Have you ever wished you could just poke the browser vendors and say, "Hey, I need this!"? Well, now you can.

item.title: November 2025 Baseline monthly digest
item.content:encoded: Read about various happenings with Baseline during November 2025.

item.title: Announcing Baseline in action
item.content:encoded: Baseline in action is a new series developed to help developers learn how to use Baseline features together to build better user experiences.

item.content:encoded: Discover some of the interesting features that have landed in stable and beta web browsers during November 2025.
